title: Ticket #7065: Allow Submit object to be assigned non-strings
description:
Currently, Submit objects must be assigned strings, as in: 

sub["foo"] = "1"

We should convert to string when this can be done cleanly. Example: 

sub["foo"] = 1

Further, there should be special cases for assigning ClassAds and Expressions: 

sub["MY.foo"] = classad.ExprTree("A < B")
remarks:
2019-May-22 13:31:39 by johnkn:
note: when setting sub["My.attr"] or sub["+attr"] from an expression. we should unparse the expression rather than tostring(), so that strings end up double-quoted and properly escaped.

2019-Jul-10 11:47:39 by karpel:
BrianB - is this ready to go into 8.9.3? Needs docs if so. I can probably write them if you're busy, just need a brief discussion to clarify what's possible now.
